sentence in indonesian using the words: Pada saat hamil, makanan yang dikonsumsi harus mengandung nutrisi yang seimbang.
english translation: During pregnancy, the food consumed should contain a balanced nutrition.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mohon segera datang ke kantor saya.
english translation: Please come to my office immediately.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Masalah baru akan timbul jika kita tidak menyelesaikan masalah saat ini.
english translation: New problems will arise if we do not solve the current problem.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kerja sama tim yang baik diperlukan untuk mencapai tujuan proyek.
english translation: Good teamwork is required to achieve the project's goals.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sistem baru akan diterapkan mulai minggu depan.
english translation: The new system will be implemented starting next week.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang ahli dalam bidang matematika.
english translation: He/she is an expert in the field of mathematics.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Setiap anggota tim harus bertanggung jawab atas tugas masing-masing.
english translation: Every team member should be responsible for their respective tasks.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Silakan berikan jawabannya dalam bentuk tulisan.
english translation: Please provide the answer in written form.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Produk ini lebih baik dibandingkan dengan versi sebelumnya.
english translation: This product is better compared to the previous version.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Masalah baru muncul setelah pembaruan perangkat lunak.
english translation: New problems emerge after the software update.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Penting untuk menitikberatkan aspek keamanan dalam perencanaan proyek ini.
english translation: It is important to emphasize the security aspect in the planning of this project.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pilih menu makanan terlebih dahulu, lalu tunggu pelayan datang.
english translation: Choose the food menu first, then wait for the waiter to come.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Restoran ini menyediakan berbagai pilihan menu makanan.
english translation: This restaurant provides various food menu options.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ini adalah kesempatan khusus yang tidak boleh dilewatkan.
english translation: This is a special opportunity that should not be missed.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mohon gunakan pintu keluar di sisi kanan.
english translation: Please use the exit door on the right side.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pelayan restoran sangat ramah dalam melayani pelanggan.
english translation: The restaurant servers are very friendly in serving customers.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Setiap siswa akan mendapatkan hadiah masing-masing.
